defs.docs: *Pure-Rust X.509 certificate serialization*

attributes.value: ! `x509` is a crate providing serialization APIs for X.509 v3 ([RFC 5280]) certificates,
! implemented using the `cookie-factory` combinatorial serializer framework.

defs.docs: Handlers for DER serialization.

defs.name: der_integer
defs.docs: Encodes a big-endian-encoded integer as an ASN.1 integer using DER.

attributes.value: / Encodes a big-endian-encoded integer as an ASN.1 integer using DER.

defs.name: der_integer_usize

attributes.value: / Encodes a usize as an ASN.1 integer using DER.

defs.name: der_bit_string
defs.docs: Encodes an ASN.1 bit string using DER.

attributes.value: / Encodes an ASN.1 bit string using DER.
/ - The contents octets for the primitive encoding shall contain an initial octet
/   followed by zero, one or more subsequent octets.
/ - The initial octet shall encode, as an unsigned binary integer with bit 1 as the
/   least significant bit, the number of unused bits in the final subsequent octet.

defs.name: der_octet_string
defs.docs: Encodes an ASN.1 octet string using DER.

attributes.value: / Encodes an ASN.1 octet string using DER.
/ The primitive encoding contains zero, one or more contents octets equal in value
/ to the octets in the data value, in the order they appear in the data value, and
/ with the most significant bit of an octet of the data value aligned with the most
/ significant bit of an octet of the contents octets.

defs.name: der_null
defs.docs: Encodes an ASN.1 NULL using DER.

attributes.value: / Encodes an ASN.1 NULL using DER.
/ The contents octets shall not contain any octets. Note – The length octet is zero.

defs.name: algorithm_identifier
defs.value: fn <'a, W, Alg> (algorithm_id: &'a Alg) -> impl SerializeFn<W> + 'a

attributes.value: /      parameters              ANY DEFINED BY algorithm OPTIONAL  }

defs.name: tbs_certificate
defs.value: fn <'a, W, Alg, PKI> (serial_number: &'a [u8], signature: &'a Alg, issuer: &'a str, not_before: DateTime<Utc>, not_after: Option<DateTime<Utc>>, subject: &'a str, subject_pki: &'a PKI) -> impl SerializeFn<W> + 'a
defs.docs: Encodes a version 1 X.509 `TBSCertificate` using DER.

attributes.value: / Encodes a version 1 X.509 `TBSCertificate` using DER.
/                           -- If present, version MUST be v2 or v3
/                           -- If present, version MUST be v2 or v3
/                           -- If present, version MUST be v3
/ Certificate users MUST be able to handle serialNumber values up to 20 octets.
/ Conforming CAs MUST NOT use serialNumber values longer than 20 octets.

defs.name: certificate
defs.value: fn <'a, W, Alg> (cert: &'a [u8], signature_algorithm: &'a Alg, signature: &'a [u8]) -> impl SerializeFn<W> + 'a
defs.docs: Encodes an X.509 certificate using DER.

attributes.value: / Encodes an X.509 certificate using DER.
/ Use [`tbs_certificate`] to serialize the certificate itself, then sign it and call
/ this function with the serialized `TBSCertificate` and signature.
